title: Designing Inquiry-Based Science Learning Environments: Practitioner Competency Development Using Object-Centered Micro-Worlds

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Elementary education practitioners designing project-centered learning environments using object-based microworld platforms to enhance scientific inquiry skills

learning_goals: Learners can independently perform scientific phenomenon modeling tasks using object-based microworlds.

Over six months, learners solve ≥3 real-world R&D problems with decision trees (minimum three-level branching) and intelligent guidance strategies (rule-based + ML models), achieving ≥80% suitability scores in peer/expert reviews
Learners can comprehensively evaluate scientific inquiry outcomes through peer feedback and system modeling.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
